TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FocusFinder extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: The algorithm used for finding the next focusable view in a given direction from a view that currently has focus.

X coordinate from which to start the search
Y coordinate from which to start the search

Docs.returns: The nearest touchable view, or null if none exists.

Docs.returns: The next focusable view, or null if none exists.
